item.title: By: Aidan Karley
item.dc:creator: Aidan Karley
item.description: <blockquote>Do we need to invest more in a global monitoring system?</blockquote>Since we don't have a reasonable chance of doing anything about an incoming impactor in any realistic timescale (up to decades away), is there any real point to knowing the date of our deaths (in the pessimistic case)?
item.content:encoded:
Do we need to invest more in a global monitoring system?

Since we don’t have a reasonable chance of doing anything about an incoming impactor in any realistic timescale (up to decades away), is there any real point to knowing the date of our deaths (in the pessimistic case)?
